titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia Lewis O 31: Qaṭr al-nadā wa-ball al-ṣadā.

note: Catalog entry describing the manuscript pasted onto f. 1r.

msContents.summary: Clear copy of Ibn Hishām's grammar compendium. Two leaves have been sliced horizontally and are missing approximately the last 6 lines on each side (f. 11-12).

persName.#text: Ibn Hishām, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Yūsuf, 1309-1360
ابن هشام، عبد الله بن يوسف،

name.#text: Free Library of Philadelphia. Rare Book Department. John Frederick Lewis collection of Oriental Manuscripts

supportDesc.extent: 50 leaves : 215 x 155 (155 x 90) mm bound to 217 x 162 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Modern foliation added in pencil, upper left recto; catchwords every verso, lower left.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black and red; pointed.

decoNote.#text: Owner's name: "Yūsuf ibn Shaykh Muḥammad al-Jamālī " dated 1170

binding.p: Laid paper over pasteboard with flap (Type II) and leather spine back. No decorations. Textblock is detached from cover.

origin.p: Item is not dated. Perhaps copied in the 17th or 18th century.

provenance: Gift of Anne Baker Lewis in 1933.
Formerly owned by Yūsuf ibn Shaykh Muḥammad al-Jamālī (note dated 1170 AH [1757], f. 1r).
Formerly owned by John Frederick Lewis.

surface.@n: Inside back cover flap open to show design
Back cover flap opened to show design
Fore edge flap closed, inside front cover
